item.title: MacVim snapshot-159
item.description:
Vim patch 8.1.2168

Features:

  • Can now use autocommand to detect an OS appearance change (dark vs light mode). See :help OSAppearanceChanged. #766

Fixes:

  • Fix text being clipped in macOS Catalina. #905
  • Fix “E432: Tags file not sorted” issue in macOS Catalina. #953. (Vim 8.1.2152)

Targets macOS 10.8+

Script interfaces have compatibility with these versions:

  • Lua 5.3
  • Perl 5.18
  • Python2 2.7
  • Python3 3.7
  • Ruby 2.6
